sentences.en: " Then art thou indeed that famous outlaw?
sentences.cn: “ 这么说来,你真的是那位名扬四海的绿林好汉喽?

sentences.en: I strum my guitar and I sing an outlaw love song.
sentences.cn: 我漫不经心乱弹的声音我的吉他和我唱一首被剥夺法律保护的人情歌.

sentences.en: In some states gambling was outlawed.
sentences.cn: 在一些州赌博被宣布为非法。

sentences.en: Jesse was an outlaw, a bandit, a criminal.
sentences.cn: 杰西是个亡命之徒，曾经抢劫犯科。

sentences.en: Long ago in England, lived a famous outlaw named Robin Hood.
sentences.cn: 很久以前,在英国有一位很出名的大盗,名叫罗宾汉.

sentences.en: Many had come to see the famous outlaw , Will Stutely , hanged.
sentences.cn: 许多人是来看有名的大盗 威尔·斯图利 被吊死.

sentences.en: plans to outlaw the carrying of knives
sentences.cn: 宣布携带刀具为非法的方案

sentences.en: The authorities put a price on the outlaw's head.
The bill would have outlawed several types of guns.
sentences.cn: 这项法案将全面禁用几种枪支。

sentences.en: The German government has outlawed some fascist groups.
sentences.cn: 德国政府已宣布一些法西斯团体为非法。

sentences.en: The motor vehicle becomes an outlaw on the highways if operated without new registration.
sentences.cn: 机动车辆未经重新注册在公路上开是非法的.

sentences.en: The outlaw hid out in the hills for several months.
sentences.cn: 逃犯在山里隐藏了几个月.

sentences.en: The outlaw pulled out a dagger and bade defiance to the policemen.
sentences.cn: 那名歹徒拔出匕首,悍然与警察对抗.

sentences.en: The outlaw was granted sanctuary in the church.
sentences.cn: 这名犯法者获准在教堂里避难.

sentences.en: These things SHOULD be outlaw and ALL GMO seeds worldwide BURNED.
sentences.cn: 这些玩意儿应该被取缔,世界范围的转基因种子都要被烧毁.

sentences.en: To outlaw deficits is a pie in the sky.

words.tran_cn: 被宣布为非法；非法化；逍遥法外

trans.tran_cn: 歹徒，亡命之徒，逃犯，被剥夺法律保护者，丧失公权者，烈马
trans.tran_en: someone who has done something illegal, and who is hiding in order to avoid punishment – used especially about criminals in the past

trans.tran_cn: 宣布…为不合法；将…放逐；剥夺…的法律保护
trans.tran_en: When something is outlawed, it is made illegal

trans.tran_cn: 宣布…为不合法，将…放逐，剥夺…的法律保护，剥夺，取缔
trans.tran_en: When something is outlawed, it is made illegal
